text:
Hi,

I am using 3rd party API to show the data in our HubSpot webpage on the list of Items.

Here my query is, how to create a dynamic page with a user-friendly URL ( I want to make the title as URL) when we click on each item to show a particular item on each page.

Currently, it was returning 404.

Any help here.

<https://www.columbusglobal.com/en/news-detail>
